messages.title: Why are so many people switching to the Green Party?
messages.content: Greens stand up to the wealthiest 1%, protect vital public services, and will protect the NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Green Party is willing to stand up to the wealthiest 1% by taxing millionaires like David Cameron.
Promising to keep every other public service â€“ punishing the vulnerable for the crimes of the banks is not the Green Party's way.
Greens will protect the NHS from being broken up and sold off by the other parties.
Greens are fighting for more homes by challenging Oxford City's Conservative controlled council's poor record on social housing.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Oxford East is one of our best chances in the UK.

issues.immigration: Greens are standing with migrants against UKIP's scapegoating.

housing.content: Greens are fighting for more homes by challenging Oxford City's Conservative controlled council's poor record on social housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: Greens fight for what matters, and when we get together we can make a real difference.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Due to recent changes to voter registration, millions of people are no longer on the electoral register - especially students.
